    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractDAO<T>
    Generic abstract DAO class for performing basic database operations on any type T.
    Bill
    Represents a bill (invoice) generated for an order.
    Client
    Represents a client entity with basic personal details.
    ClientAgeValidator
     
    ClientBLL
    The ClientBLL (Business Logic Layer) class handles the core logic for managing clients.
    ClientDAO
    Data Access Object for the Client entity.
    ClientUI
    GUI class for managing clients.
    ConnectionFactory
    Singleton factory for managing JDBC connections to the database.
    EmailValidator
     
    Log
    Class that manages logging of bills into the database.
    MainUI
    The main window of the application.
    Order
    Represents an order placed by a client for a specific product at a given time.
    OrderBLL
    The OrderBLL (Business Logic Layer) class handles the logic for placing and managing orders.
    OrderDAO
    Data Access Object for the Order entity.
    OrderUI
    GUI class for managing orders.
    Product
    Represents a product that can be ordered by clients.
    ProductBLL
    The ProductBLL (Business Logic Layer) class handles operations related to product management.
    ProductDAO
    Data Access Object for the Product entity.
    ProductPriceValidator
     
    ProductQuantityValidator
     
    ProductUI
    ProductUI is the graphical user interface for managing products.
    QuantityValidator
     
    Validator<T>
